projects.title: Bayesian Linear Regressions
projects.description: Implementing and understanding Bayesian Linear Regressions using JAX. In this post I derive the Maximum Likelihood Estimator (MLE), the Maximum A Posteriori (MAP) considering a Gaussian and Laplace prior (Deriving L1 and L2 regularisation).

projects.title: Principal Component Analysis (PCA)
projects.description: Implementing PCA using the MNIST dataset.

projects.title: Logistic Regression
projects.description: Implementing Logistic Regression using PyTorch. In this post I use a PCA to reduce dimensionality and colinearity and then implement a simple logistic regression using the breast cancer dataset from Wisconsin.

projects.title: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
projects.description: Implementing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to solve the diffusion equation.
